pylapp.tapster.client.android.tools

Class FeaturesFactory

  • pylapp.tapster.client.android.tools.FeaturesFactory

  • public class FeaturesFactory

    Class which provides methods to get feature objects. These feature objects are the kinds of objects which may have several implementations according to the needs of the app. These volatile implementations may be improved or replaced, so this class provides objects through their stubs. Thus the other classes which use them won't be impacted by the modifications of the implementations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FeaturesFactory()
      Class which provides methods to get feature objects. These feature objects are the kinds of objects which may have several implementations according to the needs of the app. These volatile implementations may be improved or replaced, so this class provides objects through their stubs. Thus the other classes which use them won't be impacted by the modifications of the implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AssistantStub buildAssistant()
      Builds an interface AssistantStub to use to as to have a chatbot assistant. Provides here a new instance of class SnipsAssistantSkeleton so as to have conversational agent using Automatic Speech Recognition and Natural Language Understanding.
      HttpClientStub buildHttpClient()
      Builds an interface HttpClientStub to use to as to send HTTP requests. Provides here a new instance of class OkHttpHttpClientSkeleton.
      LicensesDisplayerStub buildLicensesDisplayer()
      Builds an interface LicensesDisplayerStub to use to as to display the licenses of third party tools in use. Provides here a new instance of class LicensesDisplayerSkeleton.
      PermissionsManagerStub buildPermissionsManager()
      Builds an interface PermissionsManagerStub to use to ask for permissions grants. Provides here a new instance of class DexterPermissionsManagerSkeleton.
      PropertiesReaderStub buildPropertiesReader()
      Builds an interface PropertiesReaderStub to use to as to provide properties and in the end configuration. Provides here a new instance of class AssetsPropertiesReaderSkeleton so as to load configuration from properties file.
      HelpersDisplayerStub buildTapTargetsDisplayer()
      Builds an interface HelpersDisplayerStub to use to as to display the commandTap targets / pointers to components so as to introduce them. Provides here a new instance of class TapTargetHelpersDisplayerSkeleton.
      TextToSpeechStub buildTextToSpeechVocalizer()
      Builds an interface TextToSpeechStub to use to as to vocalize texts. Provides here a new instance of class AndroidTextToSpeechSkeleton.
      UiNotifierStub buildUiNotifier(android.content.Context context)
      Builds a interface UiNotifierStub to use to as to make notifications to the user interface. Provides here a new instance of class UiNotifierSkeleton which cna make toasts and update recycler views from UI thread.

        public FeaturesFactory()

        Class which provides methods to get feature objects. These feature objects are the kinds of objects which may have several implementations according to the needs of the app. These volatile implementations may be improved or replaced, so this class provides objects through their stubs. Thus the other classes which use them won't be impacted by the modifications of the implementations.
